channel.title: Research on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Home

item.title: Application of Scientific Machine Learning Techniques for Fluid Dynamics Analysis
item.description: The dynamic resistance curve serves as a highly sensitive indicator for real-time assessment of weld spot quality.

item.title: Numerical Methods for Simulating Transport Phenomena
Machine Learning Application for Weld Quality Characterization
item.description: The dynamic resistance curve serves as a highly sensitive indicator for real-time assessment of weld spot quality.

item.title: Application of Optimization Techniques in Industrial Environments
item.description: Operations Research enables optimal production scheduling by efficiently allocating resources and sequencing tasks to maximize productivity and minimize delays.

item.title: Numerical Modeling and Characterization of Oil Reservoirs
item.description: Computational representation of the physical and geological characteristics of the reservoir to predict hydrocarbon production and optimize its exploration.

item.title: Flight Dynamics Analysis and Control Surface Design
item.description: Study and optimization of an aircraft’s motion and stability through the design of aerodynamic control surfaces.

item.title: 3D Modeling and Technical Drawings of Mechanical Systems
item.description: Creation of three-dimensional representations and detailed technical drawings of mechanical systems, aiming to design, analyze, and manufacture components with precision.
